top.title: Nearly a million evacuated as Philippines braces for 'super typhoon'
top.summary: Typhoon Fung-wong with sustained winds of 185 km/h (115mph) is expected to make landfall on Sunday evening.

top.title: BBC on Luzon Island as super typhoon nears Philippines
top.summary: Typhoon Fung Wong will bring sustained winds of 185 km/h (155mph) and torrential rain to several areas on Sunday.

top.title: UK military to help protect Belgium after drone incursions
top.summary: Sir Richard Knighton, the UK military chief, says his Belgian counterpart asked for assistance this week in the form of UK personnel and equipment.

top.summary: The tech billionaire believes Optimus could play a big role in the lives of people around the world.

top.title: What does Elon Musk do with all his money?
top.summary: While he has a penchant for cars and jets, the world's richest person reportedly lives a relatively modest life.
